text: The Eder Flag Manufacturing Company, based in Oak Creek, Wisconsin, is the largest company in America that serves as both a flag and flagpole manufacturer. The company was founded in 1893. In June 2015, following the events of the Charleston church shooting, the company announced that it would no longer sell Confederate flags. == References == Category:Flag manufacturers Category:1893 establishments in Wisconsin Category:Companies based in Wisconsin
title: Eder Flag Manufacturing Company
